caption.p: A. Predicted structure of SQPV_132 (VACV_Cop A38L) (Blue) with the extracellular domain of of CD47 (light yellow) and SIRPα (green) (based on PDB entry 10.2210/pdb2jjs/pdb). B. Alignment of SQPV_132 with CD47 antigen isoform 3 precursor [Homo sapiens] (NM_001025079.1. The cysteine residues that form a conserved disulphide bond between β sheets [18] are highlighted in yellow. Residues mediating specific polar interactions with SIRPa are in magenta.
Click here for additional data file.
